name: Touhou Multi Scroll Shooting 2
description:
Multi scrolling mode

Seamlessly switching between side scroll, top-down, 3d shooter from behind and cut-scene. No camera cut during stage run.

Appearance

  • No story narration. The story is abstract.
  • Some parts of game are refer from other Touhou Project derivative works.
  • Characters are in alternate sexy costume

Keyboard control (default)

  • Arrow keys : Move
  • z : Shoot
  • x : Use bomb
  • c : Use special skill
  • Left shift : Slowdown movement and aim to an enemy.
  • Space bar : turn
  • escape : pause game
  • You can set key config as you want in the option menu.

Playable characters

  • Hakurei Reimu

  • Kirisame Marisa

  • Izayoi Sakuya

Miscellaneous game play features

  • 3 difficulties. Easy, Normal and Hard.
  • Screen resolution setting. 1920x1080, 1280x720, 640x360. Choose which ever fit for your machine. The game has better performance with a lower resolution.
  • Hitbox style setting.

  • Hp and Mp regenerate.
  • Unlimited continue. When player dies, player can continue at check point or restart a whole stage. If player use continue, the remaining hp is set to small amount. No deduct score when player use continue. No bad ending even a player use continue.
  • Kill enemies in close range to get more bonus.
  • Kill enemies consecutively to get more chain bonus.
  • Partially Japanese and Chinese translation. (Tutorial and UI)

Save game location

C:\Users\username\AppData\Local\THMSS2
